English: I don't want to go to church today.
Chinese: 今天我不想去教堂。

English: Excuse me for opening your letter by mistake.
Chinese: 對不起, 我錯開了你的信。

English: We have a special connection.
Chinese: 我們有特殊聯繫。

English: Father bought me a pair of gloves.
Chinese: 父親買了一雙手套給我。

English: Why aren't you eating?
Chinese: 你为什么不吃?

English: This is my mom.
Chinese: 这是我的妈妈。

English: I've got a headache.
Chinese: 我的头疼。

English: I want a book. Where is the bookstore?
Chinese: 我想要本书。书店在什么地方?

English: You will find him home whenever you call.
Chinese: 你甚麼時候去,他也會在家。

English: Did you buy flowers?
Chinese: 你买了花儿没有?

English: I have self-studied half a semester's worth of German.
Chinese: 我自學了半個學期的德文。

English: It's time to get up!
Chinese: 该起床了!

English: It seems to me that she has a tendency to exaggerate.
Chinese: 在我看來,她有一種誇張的傾向。

English: Have you been kept here because you didn't do your homework yesterday?
Chinese: 會不會是因為昨天沒寫作業,被留下來了?

English: I hope you'll get well soon.
Chinese: 我希望您快就会好起来。

English: I like Ozodbek's songs.
Chinese: 我喜欢噢唑百克的歌。

English: We were happy to do that for you.
Chinese: 我们乐意帮你做。

English: I got it for next to nothing.
Chinese: 我簡直不用花錢就買到了。

English: Do you mind turning on the TV?
Chinese: 你介意打開電視嗎?

English: I no longer love Tom.
Chinese: 我不再愛湯姆了。

English: Mark Zuckerberg stole my idea!
Chinese: 馬克·扎克伯格偷了我的主意!

English: When were you planning on telling Tom about what happened?
Chinese: 你准备啥时候告诉Tom发生了什么

English: Don't forget smoking is bad for your health.
Chinese: 不要忘记吸烟对你的健康有害。

English: What is hell like?
Chinese: 地狱什么样?

English: I am a boy.
Chinese: 我是一个男孩。

English: You weren't at school yesterday.
Chinese: 昨天你没有去学校。

English: Will you buy something?
Chinese: 你要买点东西吗?

English: Have you washed?
Chinese: 你洗吗?

English: Where do you work now?
Chinese: 你现在在哪里工作?

English: I find it difficult to express my meaning in words.
Chinese: 我覺得很難用言語表達我的意思。

English: I am your neighbour.
Chinese: 我是你的鄰居。

English: I've not seen him in a long time.
Chinese: 我很久没见过他了。

English: Don't matter, whichever piece is fine.
Chinese: 没关系,随便哪块。

English: How can a world produce evil when it's created by an omnibenevolent God?
Chinese: 一个由全善的上帝所创造出来的世界又怎么能产生出恶来呢?

English: Our teacher made us clean the room.
Chinese: 我們老師要我們打掃這間房間。

English: I have no intention of resigning.
Chinese: 我一点也没有要辞职的意思。

English: Any problem that can be resolved with money isn't a problem, but the problem is that I'm poor.
Chinese: 能用錢解決的問題都不是問題,可問題是我是窮人。

English: It's so secret that even I don't know what it's all about.
Chinese: 这太秘密了,连我都不知道它是关于什么的。

English: I am thinking of going abroad.
Chinese: 我在考慮出國。

English: I'll start my work on the first of July.
Chinese: 我會在七月一號開始上班。

English: He spoke about you yesterday.
Chinese: 他昨天讲了你的事。

English: I met him while I was coming home.
Chinese: 當我回家時,我遇見了他。

English: The problem is that it wouldn't work!
Chinese: 问题是行不通!

English: Where did you get your camera repaired?
Chinese: 你在哪儿修的照相机?

English: I'm sorry, but I didn't catch what you said.
Chinese: 不好意思,你剛才說甚麼?

English: I am taking my son to the zoo this afternoon.
Chinese: 我今天下午帶我兒子去動物園。

English: We want world peace.
Chinese: 我們要世界和平。

English: What am I to do now?
Chinese: 怎么办?

English: Will you accept this job?
Chinese: 你会接受这份工作吗?

English: Why aren't you eating vegetables?
Chinese: 为什么你不吃蔬菜?

English: You may as well come with me.
Chinese: 你不如跟我一起來。

English: Is there a television set in your bedroom?
Chinese: 你卧室里有电视吗?

English: I like dogs, but my sister likes cats.
Chinese: 我喜歡狗,但我姊喜歡貓。

English: Give us the tools, and we'll finish the job.
Chinese: 给我们工具,我们会完成工作。

English: If it rains tomorrow, we'll not go there.
Chinese: 如果明天下雨,我們就不會去那裏。

English: I would like to learn something about you.
Chinese: 我想听听关于你的事情。

English: Were the windows closed?
Chinese: 窗戶是關著的嗎?

English: Do you know that nice-looking girl?
Chinese: 你认识那个美女吗?

English: If you like.
Chinese: 如果你喜欢。

English: Does she know your telephone number?
Chinese: 她知道您的電話號碼嗎?

English: You should be more careful with respect to how you talk to those people.
Chinese: 关于用什么方式和那些人说话,你要谨慎一些。

English: You'll need a special tool to do it.
Chinese: 你会需要一个特殊的工具来做这件事。

English: When I thought of that, I couldn't help smiling.
Chinese: 想起这些,我忍不住要笑。

English: When she arrives, we'll start.
Chinese: 她一到,我们就开始。

English: Who is the man playing the violin?
Chinese: 那個正在拉小提琴的男人是誰?

English: Is there any life on Mars?
Chinese: 火星上有生物嗎?

English: Do you want to watch this TV programme?
Chinese: 你想看这个电视节目吗?

English: We all breathed a big sigh of relief.
Chinese: 我們都舒了一口長氣。

English: I have a terrible headache.
Chinese: 我頭痛得厲害。

English: I want to go somewhere in Europe.
Chinese: 我想去歐洲的某個地方。

English: How much is four times six?
Chinese: 6乘以4是多少?

English: In your dreams!
Chinese: 你想得美!

English: The teacher recommended that I read Shakespeare.
Chinese: 老師建議我讀莎士比亞。

English: Our yacht club has ten members.
Chinese: 我们的游艇俱乐部里有十个会员。

English: Someone has taken my shoes by mistake.
Chinese: 有人拿错了我的鞋。

English: We'd better sit down here.
Chinese: 我们还是在这里坐下吧。

English: I need it ASAP.
Chinese: 我尽快需要。

English: He's not my boyfriend.
Chinese: 他不是我的男朋友。

English: Please come back home.
Chinese: 請回家。

English: I haven't seen Tom lately.
Chinese: 我最近沒看到湯姆。

English: You promised to take care of them.
Chinese: 你答应过,会照顾他们的。

English: My little brother is watching television.
Chinese: 我弟弟在看電視。

English: Sir, you have left your lighter on the table.
Chinese: 先生,您把您的打火机留在桌子上了。

English: By the way, what is your address?
Chinese: 對了,可以把你的地址告訴我嗎?

English: He is kicking me!
Chinese: 他在踢我!

English: Should I give you those books to look at?
Chinese: 我是不是应该给你那些书看?

English: I had no time to eat.
Chinese: 我没有吃饭的时间。

English: My father became old.
Chinese: 我爸爸變老了。

English: I sell clothing online.
Chinese: 我在網路上賣衣服。

English: Would you like me to help you?
Chinese: 你要我帮你吗?

English: Next week I have things to do except on Monday and Wednesday, I am free on all the other days though.
Chinese: 下个礼拜除了星期一星期三有事,我其他日子都有空在那儿。

English: He doesn't speak our language.
Chinese: 他不會說我們的語言。

English: We have a great team.
Chinese: 我们有个好极了的团队。

English: Would you like to go to the zoo this afternoon?
Chinese: 你今天下午想不想去动物园?

English: After a long day of looking at a computer, don't you feel tired?
Chinese: 一天到晚对着电脑,你不觉得厌倦吗?

English: How much do you love me?
Chinese: 你有多爱我?

English: I got this CD player for free.
Chinese: 我免費得到這個CD播放機。

English: I'll ring you in a few days' time.
Chinese: 我過幾天會給你打電話。

English: Would you please tell me the way?
Chinese: 請你告訴我路怎麼走好嗎?

English: I believed that he would keep his promise.
Chinese: 我相信他会信守诺言。

English: Follow me. Make sure not to interrupt them.
Chinese: 跟着我。一定不要打断他们。

English: Yes. Do you know where it is?
Chinese: 嗯嗯,你知道它在哪里吗?

English: no …
Chinese: 是的。。。

English: Because Myra was cheating on exams.and she spoke back rudely.
Chinese: 因为迈拉考试作弊,还顶嘴。

English: Could you stay a little longer?
Chinese: 你能多呆一会儿吗?

English: Make it quick.
Chinese: 快点。

English: No, it's a semimonthly.
Chinese: 不,是半月刊。

English: I like it so far. My classes are pretty good right now.
Chinese: 到目前为止我很喜欢。现在的课程也很好。

English: What a pity. Are you likely to be getting more in?
Chinese: 真遗憾。还会进货吗?

English: Oh, did you?
Chinese: 哦,是吗?

English: You can check it, sir.
Chinese: 你可以仔细看看,先生。

English: Yes, beautiful weather we're having.
Chinese: 是的,天气真好。

English: Oh, hello. I'm Bias Chettri.
Chinese: 哦,你好。我是比亚斯·切特里。

English: Hopefully!
Chinese: 希望可以!

English: I've been invited over to a friend's. And you?
Chinese: 朋友邀请我去他家。和你?

English: Let me help you make one this year.
Chinese: 今年我帮你再做一个。

English: How about " As long as You Love Me "! You can pretend you're singing it to your fiancee Brooke!
Chinese: 点《只要你爱我就好》如何?你可以假装是在唱给你的未婚妻布鲁克听。

English: Oh, that's convenient, but … how much crime is there?
Chinese: 哦,那很方便,但是。。。哪里安全吗?

English: thank you, I'll wait here.
Chinese: 谢谢,我在这儿等你。

English: How was the party last night? Did you enjoy it?
Chinese: 昨晚的聚会怎么样?你喜欢吗?

English: How do you want your hair cut? Any particular way?
Chinese: 你想怎么剪头发?有什么特别的要求吗?

English: Yes, please. I'm looking for a sofa.
Chinese: 嗯嗯,谢谢。我在找沙发。

English: I need to get there before ten.Can we make it?
Chinese: 我需要在十点之前赶到那里。我们能赶到吗?

English: This is Kevin.
Chinese: 我是凯文。

English: Yes, I will get you one.
Chinese: 有的,我给你拿一件。

English: OK, Mr. Coffee Connoisseur, so what's the next step in the coffee-making process?
Chinese: 好的,咖啡鉴赏家先生,那么咖啡制作过程的下一步是什么呢?

English: I would like to see your summer suits.
Chinese: 我想看看你的夏装。

English: I don't need to leave until the very end of class.
Chinese: 快下课了我才走。

English: I have a slipped disc in my lower back and the doctor says surgery is probably the best option. Does our worker insurance cover this kind of thing?
Chinese: 我得了腰椎间盘突出,医生说我最好手术。我们的工人保险可以报销手术费用吗?

English: Cool! Teach me!
Chinese: 酷!教我!

English: Of course, I should have been more careful. I'm sorry.
Chinese: 当然,我应该更加小心。对不起。

English: I'm afraid you've made a mistake. This isn't what I ordered.
Chinese: 恐怕你弄错了。这不是我点的。

English: Thank you. I think I like playing it.
Chinese: 非常感谢。我想我喜欢网球。

English: Who was it?
Chinese: 是谁?

English: Glad to meet you, too.
Chinese: 我也很高兴见到你。

English: Why don't we get ourselves a new car? The old one's falling apart.
Chinese: 怎么不买辆新车呢?旧车都坏了。

English: Four times might be enough. Not once or twice.
Chinese: 四次就行,一两次不行。

English: Well, we can see it for ourselves.Did she tell you when we can go and look at it?
Chinese: 好吧。我们可以自己去看。 她有没有告诉你我们什么时候可以去看?

English: Ok, I will bring you photos as many as possible.
Chinese: 好的,我尽可能多拍点照片。

English: Ok. Would you like a drink too?
Chinese: 好的,你也想喝一杯吗?

English: that's good of you. why did you decide to get a rabbit.
Chinese: 你真好。你为什么决定养只兔子。

English: Yes. We'll also apply some of our special day cream that will moisturize our skin and protect it from the sun.
Chinese: 可以。而且我们还用特别配方的日霜,可以滋润皮肤并且保护皮肤不被日光晒伤。。

English: Can you tell me something about yoga?
Chinese: 你能给我讲讲瑜伽吗?

English: I'm going to my parents ' house for my father's birthday.
Chinese: 我要去我父母家给我父亲过生日。

English: I've asked him, but he won't tell me. What should we do about this? He is like you. I remember when we were at the college, you always skipped classes.
Chinese: 我问过他了,但他不告诉我。 我们应该怎么做呢? 他像你一样。 我记得我们在大学的时候,你总是逃课。

English: So I stopped drinking coffee late at night instead.
Chinese: 所以我深夜不再喝咖啡了。

English: I couldn't agree more.
Chinese: 我完全同意。

English: Now you know why I wanted to work for the Post Office!
Chinese: 现在你知道我为什么想在邮局工作了!

English: I got stuck in traffic again. There was a terrible traffic jam near the Carrefour intersection.
Chinese: 我又堵车了。家乐福十字路口附近发生了严重拥堵。

English: Where can I get the information, Kate?
Chinese: 凯特,我从哪儿能得到信息??

English: I know, but I keep thinking of him every day. And I get really depressed when he's not online.
Chinese: 我知道,但我每天都在想他。他不在线的时候,我就很沮丧。

English: Yes. It seems she can never accept a childless marriage. We had a fight last night.
Chinese: 对。她似乎永远不能接受没有孩子的婚姻。我们昨晚吵了一架。

English: Everyone else there was wearing blue jeans. Several of the women had on running shoes. I felt out of place. So I have no idea what to wear tonight.
Chinese: 其他人都穿蓝色牛仔裤。有几位女士穿着运动鞋。我觉得不合适。所以我不知道今晚穿什么。

English: Winter is great. I wish it didn't get so cold sometimes though.
Chinese: 我宁愿面对冬天而不是夏天。

English: That doesn't sound too bad.
Chinese: 听起来还不错。

English: I'm Helen Baker.
Chinese: 我是海伦·贝克。

English: Why, Tom? It's five to six already and you are still writing here.
Chinese: 为什么,汤姆?现在差五分钟就六点了,你还在这里写东西。

English: He was. He was friendly toward and showed concern for everyone he met.
Chinese: 是的。他对所遇到的每一个人都很友好,并给予关心。

English: Your oil is fine but your tires are a little flat.
Chinese: 油箱没问题,但轮胎有点瘪。

English: Well, black people are supposed to be great dancers.
Chinese: 黑人应该很擅长跳舞。

English: Hum … I say 5 500 yuan. That's as cheap as it can get.
Chinese: 嗯。。。5500元。已经很便宜了。

English: Sure. We just got some. They're upto-date.
Chinese: 当然有。我们刚好有一些。这是最新流行的。

English: Is everything OK?
Chinese: 你还好吗?

English: Yeah, absolutely!
Chinese: 是的,那当然!

English: She was pretty, her hair was the color of rich dark chocolate, waving gently to her shoulders. Her complexion was clear and golden.
Chinese: 她很漂亮,一头浓密的黑巧克力色头发,轻轻地飘扬在肩上。她的面容干净而富有光泽。

English: OK. After three days, I will come to you for it.
Chinese: 好的三天后,我来找你。

English: There will be a live show of football tonight.
Chinese: 今晚将有一场足球实况转播。

English: Can you do something about it?
Chinese: 你能做点什么吗?

English: 250 Yuan.
I can't give you a definite answer. Let's play it by ear.
Chinese: 我不能给你一个明确的答复。看情况吧。

English: Don't worry. We can call a cab. It'll be alright.
Chinese: 别担心。我们可以叫辆出租车。不会有事的。

English: Do you want black or white coffee?
Chinese: 你要黑咖啡还是牛奶咖啡?

English: After I sign it, you must take it to the Admissions and Records Office to add the class. Do you know where that is?
Chinese: 我签完字后,你必须把它拿到招生和档案室去添加课程。你知道那在哪里吗?

English: I also need three pounds of chicken breasts.
Chinese: 我还需要三磅鸡胸。

English: oh, Iris, it's about the job with the PR company.
Chinese: 哦,艾里斯,是因为公关公司的工作。

English: Oh, here you are.
Chinese: 哦,给你。

English: what do you think? Does it taste good?
Chinese: 怎么样?好吃吗?

English: I wish I knew who had moved our flower pots.
Chinese: 我真想知道是谁搬走了我们的花盆。

English: I only go skiing twice a year, so it's a real treat for me.
Chinese: 我一年只滑两次雪,所以这对我来说真是一种享受。

English: Three parties? That's quite a lot. That must have been expensive!
Chinese: 三场派对?真是太多了。那一定不便宜!

English: That was before he heard Stanley sing! I guess he couldn't stand it anymore, so he decided to give it a try himself! Allen has a really good voice! He sounds like Enrique Iglesias!
Chinese: 那是在他听到斯坦利唱歌之前!我猜他受不了了,所以他决定自己试试!艾伦的嗓音真不错!他听起来像恩里克·伊格莱西亚斯!

English: A driver died instantly. The other one was badly hurt. A poor boy called Peter was killed in the accident too.
Chinese: 一名司机当场死亡。另一个受了重伤。一个叫彼得的穷小孩也在事故中丧生。

English: Daddy, I am so glad you come out with us.
Chinese: 爸爸,你能和我们一起出来我很高兴。

English: Now, if you'll just sign here.
Chinese: 请您在这里签个名。

English: Where do these flower vases come from?
Chinese: 这些花瓶是哪里生产的?

English: Wow, it's already 10:00 AM. He must have been up late last night.
Chinese: 哇,已经10点了。他昨晚一定睡得很晚。

English: You can try it on in the fitting room over there.
Chinese: 你可以在那边试衣间试穿。

English: Left for the fork and right for the knife. Just remember that the stronger one is for knife.
Chinese: 左边是叉,右边是刀。记住,强壮的的那只手是拿刀子。

English: There are something wrong with my computer.
Chinese: 我的电脑出问题了。

English: It's for my daughter who is still a senior high school student.
Chinese: 是给我女儿买的,她在上高中。

English: You're almost 70 years old, Mom! Don't you think it would be better for you if you moved in with us?
Chinese: 妈妈,你快70岁了!你不觉得搬来和我们一起住对你更好吗?

English: What do you want to get?
Chinese: 你想要什么?

English: Do you prefer brandy or ports.
Chinese: 你想喝白兰地还是波特酒?

English: How much was that?
Chinese: 那是多少钱?

English: Wow! Look at the time. lt's about 11 0 ' clock.
Chinese: 哇!看看时间。大约11点了。

English: What do you think of being a secretary?
Chinese: 你觉得当秘书怎么样?

English: You want to go to the movies tonight?
Chinese: 你今晚想去看电影吗?

English: They sure are. They are practically jumping in the boat.
Chinese: 当然有。实际上鱼都跳到船上了。

English: Is your house well-lit?
Chinese: 你的房子光线好吗?

English: You can get a day, weekly, monthly, or student pass.
Chinese: 有日卡、周卡和学生卡。
